schematic-options-13.description: Remove no longer valid Angular schematic options from `angular.json`.

update-angular-config-v13.description: Remove deprecated options from 'angular.json' that are no longer present in v13.

update-libraries-v13.description: Update library projects to be published in partial mode and removed deprecated options from ng-packagr configuration.

drop-ie-polyfills.description: Remove polyfills required only for Internet Explorer which is no longer supported.
